function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of smartphones for monitoring urban agglomerations","Impact":"Potential breach of privacy, data security and protection of identities","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations and security measures, anonymize personal data, and obtain explicit consent for data collection","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques, secure data storage, and data access control","People":"General public, urban residents, smartphone users","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, technology companies, public administrators"},{"Description":"Use of digital tools as educational support","Impact":"Increase in social isolation without adequate support for students","Mitigation":"Provide additional support for students in the form of mental health services, counseling, and community outreach programs","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, virtual tutoring, mental health apps","People":"Students, teachers, parents, educational institutions","Owner":"School administrations, government education departments"},{"Description":"Virtual strategies in the area of health and support to the hospital system","Impact":"Potential risk of overwhelming teleconsultation systems and lack of in-person medical care","Mitigation":"Implement scalable teleconsultation systems, streamline appointment scheduling, and ensure access to in-person medical care when necessary","Technologies":"Teleconsultation platforms, appointment management software, telemedicine devices","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, hospital administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"}]}
